data.prayer: Father, help the 3,185 believers in Phrae to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Phrae, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Phrae. Through your servants plant 98 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Phrae, Thailand.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Phrae, Thailand, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Thai, Northern people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Thai, Northern people know you.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Phrae do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Phrae, Thailand find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 3,185 believers in Phrae against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

location.name: Phrae
location.cities_list: Phrae, Den Chai, Rong Kwang, Long, Sung Men
location.cities_list_w_pop: Phrae (38,538), Den Chai (17,019), Rong Kwang (12,087), Long (11,802), Sung Men
